api_list.name: /blocks
api_list.description: Get summarised details about all blocks (paginated - latest first)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koios-cardanos-decentralized-api.p.rapidapi.com/blocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koios-cardanos-decentralized-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /asset_summary
api_list.description: Get the summary of an asset (total transactions exclude minting/total wallets include only wallets with asset balance)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.name: /asset_token_registry

api_list.name: /asset_info
api_list.description: Get the information of an asset including first minting & token registry metadata

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.name: /asset_addresses
api_list.description:
Get the list of all addresses holding a given asset

`Note - Due to cardano's UTxO design and usage from projects, asset to addresses map can be infinite. Thus, for a small subset of active projects with millions of transactions, these might end up with timeouts (HTTP code 504) on free layer. Such large-scale projects are free to subscribe to query layers to have a dedicated cache table for themselves served via Koios.`

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

schema.description: An array of payment addresses holding the given token (including balances)

payment_address.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) for transaction's input UTxO

quantity.description: Asset balance on the payment address

api_list.name: /policy_asset_info
api_list.description: Get the information for all assets under the same policy

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.name: /asset_policy_info
api_list.description: Get the information for all assets under the same policy (replaced by asset_addresses)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.name: /policy_asset_list
api_list.description: Get the list of asset under the given policy (including balances)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

api_list.name: /asset_address_list
api_list.description: Get the list of all addresses holding a given asset (replaced by asset_addresses)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

schema.description: An array of payment addresses holding the given token (including balances)

payment_address.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) for transaction's input UTxO

quantity.description: Asset balance on the payment address

api_list.name: /asset_nft_address
api_list.description: Get the address where specified NFT currently reside on.

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: NFT Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

schema.description: An array of payment addresses holding the given token

payment_address.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) for transaction's input UTxO

api_list.name: /policy_asset_addresses
api_list.description:
Get the list of addresses with quantity for each asset on the given policy

`Note - Due to cardano's UTxO design and usage from projects, asset to addresses map can be infinite. Thus, for a small subset of active projects with millions of transactions, these might end up with timeouts (HTTP code 504) on free layer. Such large-scale projects are free to subscribe to query layers to have a dedicated cache table for themselves served via Koios.`

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.name: /asset_list
api_list.description: Get the list of all native assets (paginated)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koios-cardanos-decentralized-api.p.rapidapi.com/asset_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koios-cardanos-decentralized-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /asset_txs
api_list.description: Get the list of current or all asset transaction hashes (newest first)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _history
optional_parameters.description: Include all historical transactions, setting to false includes only the non-empty ones

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

optional_parameters.name: _after_block_height
optional_parameters.description: Block height for specifying time delta

schema.description: An array of Tx hashes that included the given asset (latest first)

api_list.name: /totals
api_list.description: Get the circulating utxo, treasury, rewards, supply and reserves in lovelace for specified epoch, all epochs if empty

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /asset_history

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.name: /pool_delegators
api_list.description: Return information about live delegators for a given pool.

api_list.name: /pool_delegators_history
api_list.description: Return information about active delegators (incl. history) for a given pool and epoch number (all epochs if not specified).

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /pool_history
api_list.description: Return information about pool stake, block and reward history in a given epoch _epoch_no (or all epochs that pool existed for, in descending order if no _epoch_no was provided)

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /pool_stake_snapshot
api_list.description: Returns Mark, Set and Go stake snapshots for the selected pool, useful for leaderlog calculation

api_list.name: /pool_updates
api_list.description: Return all pool updates for all pools or only updates for specific pool if specified

api_list.name: /account_utxos
api_list.description: Get a list of all UTxOs for a given stake address (account)

required_parameters.name: _stake_address
required_parameters.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

address.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) for transaction's input UTxO

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

api_list.name: /pool_blocks
api_list.description: Return information about blocks minted by a given pool for all epochs (or _epoch_no if provided)

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

epoch_slot.description: Slot number of the block in epoch

abs_slot.description: Absolute slot number of the block

api_list.name: /epoch_block_protocols
api_list.description: Get the information about block protocol distribution in epoch

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /epoch_params
api_list.description: Get the protocol parameters for specific epoch, returns information about all epochs if no epoch specified

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /epoch_info
api_list.description: Get the epoch information, all epochs if no epoch specified

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

optional_parameters.name: _include_next_epoch
optional_parameters.description: Include information about nearing but not yet started epoch, to get access to active stake snapshot information if available

out_sum.description: Total output value across all transactions in epoch

fees.description: Total fees incurred by transactions in epoch

tx_count.description: Number of transactions submitted in epoch

blk_count.description: Number of blocks created in epoch

start_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch start

end_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch end

first_block_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch's first block

last_block_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch's last block

active_stake.description: Total active stake in epoch stake snapshot (null for pre-Shelley epochs)

total_rewards.description: Total rewards earned in epoch (null for pre-Shelley epochs)

avg_blk_reward.description: Average block reward for epoch (null for pre-Shelley epochs)
